## FiltersState interface

Maintains the current state of facets and filters in the application.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FiltersState 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [facets?](./answers-headless.filtersstate.facets.md) | [DisplayableFacet](./answers-headless.displayablefacet.md)<!-- -->\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> The dynamic collection of facets that can be applied to filter the search results and whether each of them is currently selected. |
|  [static?](./answers-headless.filtersstate.static.md) | [SelectableFilter](./answers-headless.selectablefilter.md)<!-- -->\[\] \| [DisplayableFilter](./answers-headless.displayablefilter.md)<!-- -->\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> The collection of possible static filters that can be applied to the search results and whether each of them is currently selected. |
